Original: That is another request from the
Outland Count. This time, he wants
you to find a source of water.
[Page]
You can learn more by talking to him
at the Grand Court. I shall await
your swift return.
Translation: That is another request from the
Outland Count. This time, he wants
you to find a source of water.
[Page]
You can learn more by talking to him
at the Grand Court. I shall await
your swift return.

Original: I heard from the Outland Count that
you found the water rather quickly!
You seem to be skilled explorers.
[Page]
Thanks to you, the Outland Count is
learning more about these lands.
He is quite excited to do so.
[Page]
The Outland Count's requests are tied
to the city's growth, so they are very
important. Here is your reward.
Translation: I heard from the Outland Count that
you found the water rather quickly!
You seem to be skilled explorers.
[Page]
Thanks to you, the Outland Count is
learning more about these lands.
He is quite excited to do so.
[Page]
The Outland Count's requests are tied
to the city's growth, so they are very
important. Here is your reward.

Original: Hmm? Ah, the request! Yes, yes, are
you the ones who accepted it? Then I
dare say I can ask a large favor.
[Page]
Do you know the wide river that flows
around the city?
[Page]
That river's water has long sustained
our people. What I want is to discover
the river's [Color:5]source[Color:0].
[Page]
It's bound to be somewhere in the
[Color:5]Windy Plains[Color:0]. If you can find it,
report back to me here.
[Page]
Though if you already know where it
is, there's no need to wait!
Translation: Hmm? Ah, the request! Yes, yes, are
you the ones who accepted it? Then I
dare say I can ask a large favor.
[Page]
Do you know the wide river that flows
around the city?
[Page]
That river's water has long sustained
our people. What I want is to discover
the river's [Color:5]source[Color:0].
[Page]
It's bound to be somewhere in the
[Color:5]Windy Plains[Color:0]. If you can find it,
report back to me here.
[Page]
Though if you already know where it
is, there's no need to wait!

Original: Ah, my friends! Have you found the
point from whence the river flows?
Translation: Ah, my friends! Have you found the
point from whence the river flows?

Original: [Color:5]Did you find the river source?[Color:0]
Yes
No
I need more information
Translation: [Color:5]Did you find the river source?[Color:0]
Yes
No
I need more information

Original: More information? Hmm... the river
must have a [Color:5]source[Color:0] somewhere. Maybe
you'll find it simply by going [Color:5]north[Color:0]?
Translation: More information? Hmm... the river
must have a [Color:5]source[Color:0] somewhere. Maybe
you'll find it simply by going [Color:5]north[Color:0]?

Original: Then I will wait patiently here.
[Page]
Er... you don't think you'll be long,
do you?
Translation: Then I will wait patiently here.
[Page]
Er... you don't think you'll be long,
do you?

Original: Splendid! Here, show me just where it
was you found the river's source.
Translation: Splendid! Here, show me just where it
was you found the river's source.

Original: Ah! I'll have my scouts look into that
spot very soon.
Translation: Ah! I'll have my scouts look into that
spot very soon.

Original: Why, shame on you! The river's source
was certainly not at the point where
you said it would be.
[Page]
I'm not one to appreciate pranks and
practical jokes. Next time, I want
you to tell me the true location.
Translation: Why, shame on you! The river's source
was certainly not at the point where
you said it would be.
[Page]
I'm not one to appreciate pranks and
practical jokes. Next time, I want
you to tell me the true location.

Original: Wonderful news! My scouts tell me
they've confirmed the location of
the river's source.
[Page]
It was nestled quite deep in the area
you reported, but thanks to your
information, we've found it at last.
[Page]
Thank you, [Guild] Guild. You have
once again contributed to the
development of our fair city.
[Page]
I have already contacted the Dancing
Peacock about your reward. May luck
be with you in your travels!
Translation: Wonderful news! My scouts tell me
they've confirmed the location of
the river's source.
[Page]
It was nestled quite deep in the area
you reported, but thanks to your
information, we've found it at last.
[Page]
Thank you, [Guild] Guild. You have
once again contributed to the
development of our fair city.
[Page]
I have already contacted the Dancing
Peacock about your reward. May luck
be with you in your travels!

Original: Hmm? Did you need something else?
I think you should go first to the
Dancing Peacock about that reward!
Translation: Hmm? Did you need something else?
I think you should go first to the
Dancing Peacock about that reward!

Original: As you travel upriver in search of
its source, you arrive at a quiet
spot surrounded by cliffs.
[Page]
The cool wind here brushes your skin,
while the soft murmuring of the river
plays on your ears...
[Page]
Clean water gushes through the cracks
in the cliff face. This must be the
[Color:5]river's source[Color:0] the Count sought!
[Page]
You must remember to mark its location
on your map before reporting back to
the Grand Court...
Translation: As you travel upriver in search of
its source, you arrive at a quiet
spot surrounded by cliffs.
[Page]
The cool wind here brushes your skin,
while the soft murmuring of the river
plays on your ears...
[Page]
Clean water gushes through the cracks
in the cliff face. This must be the
[Color:5]river's source[Color:0] the Count sought!
[Page]
You must remember to mark its location
on your map before reporting back to
the Grand Court...

Original: You notice a cool breeze on your skin.
You look across to see a ring of
cliffs. You hear rushing water...
[Page]
You look below and see crystal clear
water gushing from a cliff face.
[Page]
This must be the source of the river
that flows to Tharsis. You are lost
for words to describe its beauty...
Translation: You notice a cool breeze on your skin.
You look across to see a ring of
cliffs. You hear rushing water...
[Page]
You look below and see crystal clear
water gushing from a cliff face.
[Page]
This must be the source of the river
that flows to Tharsis. You are lost
for words to describe its beauty...
